name: Pulse (itch) (Cookie Dragon)
description:
Survival, Stranded on a strange planet Find energy to sustain yourself until you get away

Made during Global Game Jam 2018

https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/pulse-0



Controls

WASD - Move

Space - Ping

Ping shows tower directions but alert enemies.
Follow the towers to the ship to escape!
